price: 89. Behalve voor degenen die hierna berouw hebben en goede daden verrichten. Waarlijk, Allah is de Vaak-Vergevende de Genadevolle.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ تَابُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ وَأَصۡلَحُواْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٌ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna tābū min baʿdi dhālika wa-aṣlaḥū fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
